channel.title: If Player Has Item

item.title: If Player Has Item
item.dc:creator: @Bryan_SG Bryan[SG]
item.description:
@Bryan_SG wrote:

ok, i was workin on my own barrows quest. On the barrows chest i wanted to make it give u the barrows item only if u have the key. It didnt work here is my code:

[code]if (objectID == 10284)
{
if (playerHasItem(709)){

addItem(995,50000);
if (misc.random2(100) <= 15){

addItem(Item.percentBarrows(), 1);
sendMessage("You found a Barrows Item and 50k in the chest...");

}else{

if (misc.random2(100) <= 1){
	addItem(Item.randomPHat(),1);
	
	sendMessage("You found 50k and a Party Hat in the chest!");
} else {
	sendMessage("You did not find a Barrows Item, But found 100k in the chest");
	addItem(995,50000);
}

}
teleportToX = 3565;
teleportToY = 3313;
sendMessage(“and get teleported!”);
deleteItem(709, getItemSlot(709), 1); //Delete Chest Key from player.
}else {
sendMessage(“You Need The Chest Key!”);

}

}[/code]

Even if i have the key it still says, “Need Chest Key” which i have set to say if u dont have it. What did i do wrong

Read full topic
